comments.comments_text: Goal! Benjamin Pavard clips a neat ball into the box in the direction of Maxim Choupo-Moting (Bayern Munich), who jumps highest and steers a bullet header from the centre of the box into the left side of the goal. Keylor Navas had no chance of stopping that. 1:2.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Joshua Kimmich sends a cross in from the set piece and Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich) leaps high to connect with it on the edge of the 6-yard box. His close-range header goes inside the left post and the score changes to 2:2.

comments.comments_text: Julian Draxler (Paris SG) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Antonio Mateu Lahoz didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
